name: JUVENILE PRODUCT MANUFACTURERS ASSOCIATION (JPMA)
sampleDescriptions: Discussed several pending CPSC rules, including the Infant Support Cushion rule and Bassinet Rule and their impact on the industry.
Discussed the impact of tariffs on the juvenile product industry and the need for exemptions for juvenile products to tariffs.
Discussed the impact of IEEPA tariffs on the juvenile product industry and the need for exemptions for juvenile products to tariffs.
Product safety for infants and juveniles. Carseats,strollers, toys, safety standards. Trade and tariffs.
International trade, product import that meet safety standards, advocating for tariff exemptions.
